T02D1277:105a-1: shr'i he badzra aa bhi sa ma ya ti la ka n'a ma //

T02D1277:106a-21: rang bzhin de kho na nyid kyis mchod pas mchod

T02D1277:106a-26: par gyur pa ni de kho na nyid kyi mchod

T02D1277:106a-29: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pa //
T02D1277:106a-30: g-yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid //

T02D1277:106b-15: / skyabs su mchi'o // par bgyi'o // bla na

T02D1277:106b-27: bar 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi snying rje dang

T02D1277:106b-29: longs spyod spyod pa la sogs pa rnams la mi

T02D1277:107a-0: ji ltar bsdu ba'i rnam pa ni @107a * //

T02D1277:107b-9: a'a li phrag gnyis yongs su gyur pa las me

T02D1277:107b-12: de'i steng du da dha da dha ya ra la
T02D1277:107b-13: dang ldan pa'i k'a li phrag gnyis yongs su gyur

T02D1277:107b-15: bzhin nyi ma shes rab kyi bdag nyid /

T02D1277:108a-13: // // tshogs gnyis rnam par dag pas phyag gnyis pa /

T02D1277:108a-15: ye shes lnga ro mnyam par bsgom pa dag pas

T02D1277:108a-18: bde ba chen po dang snying rje'i ro dag pas
T02D1277:108a-19: khrag gis gang zhing rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa

T02D1277:108a-21: sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i ro nyal ba'i

T02D1277:108a-28: thams cad la kun du khro pa spangs pa dang
T02D1277:108a-29: snying rje chen po'i tshogs dag pas g-yon pa'i zhabs
T02D1277:108a-30: kyi mthe bo'i rtse mos yid song ba'i stan la

T02D1277:108a-32: gsum rnam par dag pas khro gnyer gsum dang ldan
T02D1277:108a-33: pa yi ge a'a li k'a li lnga bcu dag

T02D1277:108b-4: ska rags su grags pa'i phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa /

T02D1277:108b-16: chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rdul gyis gang ba'i thod

T02D1277:108b-23: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang ldan pa mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal can /
T02D1277:108b-24: ske rags sil bu can ma dang lhan cig yang
T02D1277:108b-25: dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis gnyis su med
T02D1277:108b-26: pa'i bde ba chen pos lus thams cad la bgrod
T02D1277:108b-27: pa'i mthu las ba spu langs pa'i lus can no
T02D1277:108b-28: // g-yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid //
T02D1277:108b-29: ces kha cig sgrog par byed do //
T02D1277:108b-30: srid pa gsum mdzes par gnon pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1277:108b-31: lus kyi longs spyod rgyas shing dam pa'i rol sgeg
T02D1277:108b-32: gi nyams can nyid kyi phyir sgeg pa dang bcas
T02D1277:108b-33: pa'o // 'jig rten gsum mnan pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo'o //
T02D1277:108b-34: mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1277:108b-35: mnan pa nyid kyi phyir mi sdug pa /
T02D1277:108b-36: sgeg pa'i rjes su byed pa'i rtse 'jo 'phro ba ni rgod pa /
T02D1277:109a-0: @109a * // bskal pa 'jig pa rtsom pa 'byung ba'i nyi ma'i
T02D1277:109a-1: dkyil 'khor shin tu gtum pa la yum dang rtse
T02D1277:109a-2: zhing rnam par rtse bas drag shul can /
T02D1277:109a-3: lha dang lha ma yin mtha' dag skrag par byed pa'i lus can gyis 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D1277:109a-4: rtog pa mtha' dag gi mtshan ma med cing bde
T02D1277:109a-5: ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du yang sngon gyi
T02D1277:109a-6: smon lam las grub pa phul du byung ba'i sprul
T02D1277:109a-7: pa ma lus pa rnam par spros te /
T02D1277:109a-8: 'gro ba'i don phun sum tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin 'byung ba ni snying rje chen po /
T02D1277:109a-9: 'gro ba las 'das shing bla na med pa'i lus
T02D1277:109a-10: can nyid ni rngam pa ste rmad du byung ba
T02D1277:109a-11: / chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1277:109a-12: thog ma med pa'i gter can nyid kyi phyir zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1277:109a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi nang rnam par dag pa ni /
T02D1277:109a-17: g-yung mo rkang dang tshil bu /
T02D1277:109a-18: pags pa rim pa bdun byang chub kyi yan lag bdun /
T02D1277:109a-20: de bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang
T02D1277:109a-21: ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
T02D1277:109a-22: kyi nang du son pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D1277:109a-23: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i lte pa'i nang du
T02D1277:109a-24: gnas pa'i nyi ma'i steng du h'um yig / bcom
T02D1277:109a-25: ldan 'das ma'i thugs kar gnas pa'i zla ba la
T02D1277:109a-26: aam yig gi sa bon las skyes pa'i gri gug
T02D1277:109a-27: gi yu ba la gnas pa'i zla ba la aam
T02D1277:109a-28: yig bltas nas / de dag gi 'od zer spros shing bsdus pas /
T02D1277:109a-29: mdun gyi lam du ye shes sems dpa' 'bad pa
T02D1277:109a-30: dang bcas pas spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la
T02D1277:109a-31: / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las 'phros
T02D1277:109a-32: pa'i goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1277:109a-33: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag
T02D1277:109a-37: h'um yig gis dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs
T02D1277:109a-38: pa'i don chu la chu bzhin du bcug / bam
T02D1277:109a-39: yig gis bcings / ho: yig gis dbang du byas te /
T02D1277:109a-40: de nas bar ma chad par snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1277:109a-41: gyi 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pas sangs rgyas thams
T02D1277:109b-0: sngar bzhin ma mo @109b brgyad kyis mngon par mchod cing bkur stir byas te /
T02D1277:109b-1: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1277:109b-2: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1277:109b-3: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1277:109b-4: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1277:109b-5: aa bhi shanytsan+tu m'am sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D1277:109b-7: de nas sngas rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pas //
T02D1277:109b-8: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1277:109b-9: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02D1277:109b-10: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1277:109b-11: rdo rje'i dbang bskur chen po sbyin //
T02D1277:109b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes gsungs shing /
T02D1277:109b-13: bdud rtsi lnga 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D1277:109b-14: bdag nyid kyi bum pas de la gnas pa'i dri
T02D1277:109b-15: ma dang sgrib pa thams cad zad par byas te
T02D1277:109b-16: / lan pa med cing mngon par mtshams sbyor ba
T02D1277:109b-17: med pa'i ye shes kyi chu rnams kyis mngon par
T02D1277:109b-19: dbang bskur ba'i dus nyid du gur gum dang me tog la sogs pa'i char 'bab cing /
T02D1277:109b-20: rnga po che'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1277:109b-21: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod
T02D1277:109b-22: par bya zhing 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i glus
T02D1277:109b-23: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bstod par bya
T02D1277:109b-24: ste / dbang bskur ba'i chu lhag ma rang gi rigs kyi bdag por bsgoms te /
T02D1277:109b-25: de las kun du byang ba 'tsho ba rnam par
T02D1277:109b-26: dag pas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i
T02D1277:109b-27: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1277:109b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1277:109b-30: zhes dbang bskur ba lhag par brtan par bya'o //
T02D1277:109b-31: de nas bar ma chad par dbang po rnams su go cha byas te /
T02D1277:109b-32: de la mig tu gti mug rdo rje ma'i ming can dang mtshungs pa dkar mo'o //
T02D1277:109b-33: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje ma bdag med ma'i ming can dang mtshungs pa nag mo //
T02D1277:109b-34: sna'i bu ga dag la ser sna rdo rje ma
T02D1277:109b-35: nang gi gsang ba'i dkar ba'i dkar mo'i ming can
T02D1277:109b-37: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma nang gi chu'i rnal 'byor ma dang 'dra ba dmar mo /
T02D1277:109b-38: lus la phrag dog rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes kyang grags pa bzhin ljang gu /
T02D1277:110a-1: 'byor ma bdag med ma'i ming can ma bzhin nag mo'o //
T02D1277:110a-2: 'di rnams kyang grangs ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1277:110a-3: a'am aam a'im a'im aum gi sa bon las skyes pa /
T02D1277:110a-6: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:110a-7: ro la gnas pa'i zla ba la bzhugs par bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D1277:110a-8: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su yang /
T02D1277:110a-9: aom a'a: h'um gi yi ge las skyes ba'i dkar po dmar po nag po'i mdog can ma /
T02D1277:110a-10: 'jig rten gsum las byung bas spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma dang bdag med ma bsam par bya'o //
T02D1277:110a-11: aom aam aam gi sa bon las skyes pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:110a-12: dbyibs ni gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1277:110a-13: de bzhin du re zhig mtsho skyes rdo rje'i rim pas /
T02D1277:110a-14: ye shes sems dpa' bcug / dbang bskur /
T02D1277:110a-15: go cha'i rim pa nges par mthong ngo //
T02D1277:110a-16: l'u yi pa'i zhabs kyi mngon par rtogs par ni /
T02D1277:110a-17: go cha'i bar ma chad par ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1277:110a-18: bcug / de nas dbang bskur ro zhes go rims
T02D1277:110a-19: so // de bzhin du sh'anti pa'i dgongs pa'i rjes
T02D1277:110a-20: su 'brang ba'i kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub
T02D1277:110a-22: rnam par dag pa'i gter du ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1277:110a-23: 'khor bcug pa'i bar ma chad du go cha brjod
T02D1277:110a-24: nas dbang bskur bar mngon par brjod pa ni grub
T02D1277:110a-25: pa gnyis kyi bzhed pa dang mthun pa ma yin
T02D1277:110a-26: no // de'i bar ma chad du mdun du dzam
T02D1277:110a-27: yig sngo po las skyes pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1277:110a-28: gzhu'i dbyibs can mchog ma gnyis la g-yo ba'i ba
T02D1277:110a-30: de'i steng du ram dmar po las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
T02D1277:110a-31: re phas zur gsum la mtshan pa /
T02D1277:110a-32: de'i steng du mgo bo gsum gyi skyed pu la gnas pa'i /
T02D1277:110a-33: aa yig dmar po las skyes pa'i padma'i snod de thod pa'o //
T02D1277:110a-34: de'i dbus su bh'um a'am kham h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1277:110a-36: bi ra shu ma mu'i rang gi ngo bo'i sgron
T02D1277:110a-37: ma lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga rang rang gi sa
T02D1277:110a-38: bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1277:110a-39: de'i steng du aom dkar po bsams nas de'i gzugs
T02D1277:110b-0: khyab pa'i aam yig las skyes pa'i @110b zla ba'i
T02D1277:110b-2: h'um yig dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje de'i sa bon gyis mchan pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1277:110b-3: de nas rlung gis bskul ba'i mes rdo rje'i 'khor de thams cad dang rdo rje yang zhu /
T02D1277:110b-4: lnga tshan bzhi po zhu ba las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i snod de nyid kyi nang du bsgrubs te /
T02D1277:110b-5: de nas ji srid du de nyid gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1277:110b-6: de'i steng du aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum bltas nas /
T02D1277:110b-7: de'i 'od zer mgal me'i rnam pas srid pa gsum na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1277:110b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1277:110b-9: bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas de nyid la rab tu
T02D1277:110b-10: bcug ste ro mnyam par gyur pas /
T02D1277:110b-11: lha'i dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i ston ka'i zla
T02D1277:110b-12: ba'i 'od ltar dri ma med par rnam par bsams
T02D1277:110b-13: nas rang gi lce'i rtse mo la h'um dkar po
T02D1277:110b-14: las byung ba'i rdo rje nas 'bru'i tshad tsam bsams
T02D1277:110b-15: te / de'i 'od zer mgal me lta bus bcom
T02D1277:110b-16: ldan 'das kyi bdud rtsi de zhal gyis myang zhing
T02D1277:110b-17: te / / bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal du byin to //
T02D1277:110b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sva da badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1277:110b-19: zhes brjod pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par gyur pa'o //
T02D1277:110b-20: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las rnam par 'thon
T02D1277:110b-21: pa'i gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1277:110b-22: me long dang / pi wang dang /
T02D1277:110b-24: ro'i snod dang sna tshogs pa'i gos dang /
T02D1277:110b-25: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyag gis mchod pa bar ma chad par bya ste /
T02D1277:110b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzr'a badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma konya ham /
T02D1277:110b-28: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis //
T02D1277:110b-29: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor //
T02D1277:110b-30: khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog brnyes shing //
T02D1277:110b-31: khyod kyis rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun brgyan te //
T02D1277:110b-32: snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa //
T02D1277:110b-33: sgyu ma spros pa rdo rje sgrub pa'i yid //
T02D1277:110b-34: he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes //
T02D1277:110b-35: zhes rdo rje'i glu yis bstod par bya ste /
T02D1277:110b-36: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1277:110b-38: phyi nas 'khor lo bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bya ste /
T02D1277:111a-0: de la lte ba'i 'og tu rnam par gnas pa'i sbrul ba'i 'khor lo dmar @111a * //
T02D1277:111a-2: sna tshogs mdog / padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa
T02D1277:111a-3: bzhi 'od zer 'phro ba can gyi snying po la
T02D1277:111a-4: / aam yig nag po byin gyis brlab cing gdong steng du phyogs pa'o //
T02D1277:111a-5: snyad gar chos kyi 'khor lo dkar po padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1277:111a-6: de'i dbus su sa bon h'um yig sngon po shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su /
T02D1277:111a-7: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis grangs ji lta bar /
T02D1277:111a-8: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham gi sa bon no //
T02D1277:111a-9: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su spyan
T02D1277:111a-10: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon ae wam
T02D1277:111a-11: m'a ya ste 'di rnams kyi kha 'og tu'o //
T02D1277:111a-12: mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo mtsho skyes dmar po 'dab ma bcu drug pa /
T02D1277:111a-13: de'i ze'u 'brul aam yig dmar po /
T02D1277:111a-14: a'a li k'a lis yongs su bskor ba 'di rnams kyi kha steng du'o //
T02D1277:111a-15: spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dam skyes 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa /
T02D1277:111a-16: dbus su ham yig dkar pos byin gyis brlabs pa kha 'og tu blta ba'o //
T02D1277:111a-17: 'di rnams thams cad kyi yi ge zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D1277:111a-18: de nas 'khor lo bzhi po de'i 'od zer gyi
T02D1277:111a-19: tshogs nam mkha' la spros pas 'gro ba'i don byas
T02D1277:111a-20: nas / der de nyid nang du bsgom par byas te /
T02D1277:111a-21: de'i rjes su rigs lnga'i cha shas can du bya ba'i don du /
T02D1277:111a-22: bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyi bo dang snying ga dang
T02D1277:111a-23: lte ba dang gsang gnas dang brla zung rnams su
T02D1277:111a-26: yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad dang
T02D1277:111a-27: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od
T02D1277:111a-28: dpag med dang don yod grub pa bsam par bya'o
T02D1277:111a-29: // h'um yongs su gyur pa las padma dang rdo
T02D1277:111a-30: rje a'a: dang aom yig gis yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1277:111a-31: ze 'bru dang nor bu bsam par bya ste /
T02D1277:111a-32: de nas aom padma su kha dh'a ra ma h'a
T02D1277:111a-33: r'a ga su khanda tsa tur a'a nanda bha ga
T02D1277:111a-34: bi shva h'um h'um h'um ka r+yam ku ru shva
T02D1277:111a-35: me / aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tur
T02D1277:111a-36: a'a nanda d'a ya ka kha ga mu kha ae
T02D1277:111a-37: ka r'a so n'a tha h'um h'um h'um ka r+yam
T02D1277:111a-39: zhes pas padma dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs par byas nas /
T02D1277:111a-40: 'dzag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i ched du /
T02D1277:111a-41: padma dang rdo rje'i sbu gu dag la h'um phat kyi yi ge ser po bsam par bya'o //
T02D1277:111b-0: @111b de nas s'i'i yi ge gsum brjod cing /
T02D1277:111b-1: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1277:111b-2: zhes pa 'dis rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D1277:111b-3: dam tshig la yang las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T02D1277:111b-4: rigs lnga'i cha shas can bsgrub pa la sogs pa thams cad yid la bya'o //
T02D1277:111b-5: gzhan yang ma dag pa'i bde ba snyems pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1277:111b-6: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
T02D1277:111b-7: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las lhag par rtogs
T02D1277:111b-8: pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1277:111b-9: nyid kyi dbye bas dga' ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D1277:111b-10: kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug la yang de bzhin kho
T02D1277:111b-11: nar goms pa'i dbang las rim pas 'char ba'i mthar
T02D1277:111b-12: / rtog pa mtha' dag gi dra ba med pa
T02D1277:111b-13: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba sgo thams
T02D1277:111b-14: cad la lan cig gnas pa'i cha shas can gyi
T02D1277:111b-15: rnam pa dri mas mtshan pa ma yin pa 'od
T02D1277:111b-16: gsal ba la rab tu bzhugs pa ni rim pa'o
T02D1277:111b-17: / // yang na de la 'di'i rim pa ni /
T02D1277:111b-22: nyi ma bcom ldan 'das ma la /
T02D1277:111b-23: bcom ldan 'das ma rjes su chags pas zhu bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das la /
T02D1277:111b-24: bcom ldan 'das thugs ka'i nyi ma la /
T02D1277:111b-26: rdo rje de'i lte bar gnas pa la /
T02D1277:111b-27: nyi ma don yod grub pa'i ngo bo h'um yig gi a'u yig la /
T02D1277:111b-28: a'u yig 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin gyi ha yig la /
T02D1277:111b-29: ha yig rin chen 'byung ldan du grags pa'i mgo bo la /
T02D1277:111b-30: mgo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gyi zla phyed la /
T02D1277:111b-31: zla ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi thig le la /
T02D1277:111b-32: thig le lhag ma mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi n'a da la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1277:111b-33: kha cig gis ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi thig le /
T02D1277:111b-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi n'a dar gsungs so //
T02D1277:111b-35: blo gros lhag pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1277:111b-36: n'a da yang skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi cha shas tsam du bsams nas dor bar bya ste /
T02D1277:111b-37: de nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa la
T02D1277:111b-38: sogs pa mchog gi stong pa nyid sprin med pa'i
T02D1277:111b-39: nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang
T02D1277:112a-1: smon lam gyi nus pa gnas pas sgrub pa'i dbang las de bzhin kho nar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1277:112a-2: de bzhin du yang dang yang du ldang pa'i bya ba la zhugs nas /
T02D1277:112a-3: de nas ji ltar dbugs kyi rlung me long la
T02D1277:112a-4: gnas pa kun nas song ba bzhin du yang dag
T02D1277:112a-5: pa'i mtha' la rnal 'byor pas yang dang yang du
T02D1277:112a-6: 'jug par bya'o // rim pa 'di ni bden pa
T02D1277:112a-7: gnyis dbyer med pa 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D1277:112a-8: rang bzhin zung dang gnyis ma yin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1277:112a-9: gyi rnal 'byor mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02D1277:112a-10: 'di ni de kho na nyid shes rab dang bcas
T02D1277:112a-11: pa'i bsgom pa 'od gsal la rab tu 'jug pa'i
T02D1277:112a-12: thabs so // shes rab med pa'i bsgom pa la ltos pas ni /
T02D1277:112a-13: shes rab rnam par dag pa'i kha tv'am ga nyid ngo //
T02D1277:112a-14: shes rab kha tv'am ga zugs can ma /
T02D1277:112a-16: de'i phyir gtum mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pas lhan
T02D1277:112a-17: cig skyes pa 'char ba ni 'od gsal la rab
T02D1277:112a-18: tu 'jug pa'o // de la re zhig 'di'i gtum mo'i rnal 'byor ni /
T02D1277:112a-19: lha'i rnam par gsal ba la /
T02D1277:112a-20: lte ba'i 'khor lor aam yig nyid dam /
T02D1277:112a-22: srog gi rlung 'bab pa gnyis po dag yongs su bsdus nas /
T02D1277:112a-23: aa ba dh'u t'ir bcug ste /
T02D1277:112a-24: lte ba'i 'og gi rlung gis sbar bar gyur pa'i
T02D1277:112a-25: rab tu gtum pa'i me drang zhing shin tu phra
T02D1277:112a-27: mchog gi bdag med ma'i ming can bcom ldan 'das ma gtum mo 'bar bas /
T02D1277:112a-28: snying ga'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams dang /
T02D1277:112a-29: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi bsregs te /
T02D1277:112a-30: ji srid du spyi bo'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i yid 'joms pa ma yin pa la reg par bya'o //
T02D1277:112a-32: bcom ldan 'das ri bong can 'dzag ste 'ong ba
T02D1277:112a-33: de'i tshe yang gtum mo myur du 'bar bar byed
T02D1277:112a-34: pa'o // de rab tu 'bar ba dang ri bong can shin tu myur bar 'dzag ste /
T02D1277:112a-35: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs bzhin pa'i gtum mo
T02D1277:112a-36: dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur nas yid nges par
T02D1277:112a-38: byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'dzag pa yang sprul
T02D1277:112a-39: pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams su nye bar
T02D1277:112b-0: bsags pas @112b mchog tu dga' ba'i rim pas spyi
T02D1277:112b-1: bo nas padma dang rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug
T02D1277:112b-2: pa la rnam par ma chad par stong pa nyid
T02D1277:112b-3: dang / snying rje dbyer med pa rim gyis 'phel
T02D1277:112b-4: ba nye bar son pa gtum mo'i me'i 'od kyis
T02D1277:112b-6: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsa sum cu rtsa
T02D1277:112b-7: gnyis la khyab par gyur cing de nas gzhan rtsa
T02D1277:112b-8: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ji srid par lus
T02D1277:112b-9: thams cad la mngon par khyab par byed pa nang
T02D1277:112b-10: gi nyi ma dang zla ba'i ngo bo shes rab
T02D1277:112b-11: dang thabs mnyam par bgrod pa dga' bral gyi bde
T02D1277:112b-12: ba chen po'i mthus phung po dang khams la sogs
T02D1277:112b-13: pa bdud dang bcas pa 'di mtha' dag mngon du
T02D1277:112b-14: gyur cing rab tu gyur to zhes pa gtum mo'i
T02D1277:112b-15: rnal 'byor gyis 'od gsal la rab tu bzhugs pa'o
T02D1277:112b-16: // 'di nyid ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1277:112b-17: 'di nyid ni dpyid kyi thig le'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1277:112b-18: de ltar na dpyid ni bcom ldan 'das te zla ba'o //
T02D1277:112b-19: de'i thig le ni bcom ldan 'das ma gtum mo
T02D1277:112b-20: ste de dag gi sbyor ba zhes pa 'di nyid
T02D1277:112b-22: gtum mo rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor bas brtan
T02D1277:112b-23: par bsrungs pas mchog gi bde ba chen po'i rgyur
T02D1277:112b-24: gyur lhan cig skyes pa gtum mo gsal bar bya'o
T02D1277:112b-25: // de ltar yang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge
T02D1277:112b-26: 'dzin la zung dang gnyis ma yin par gnas pa'i
T02D1277:112b-27: rnal 'byor bas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub lhag
T02D1277:112b-28: // par rtogs so // rnal 'byor ma zhes pa
T02D1277:112b-29: ni gsang chen rtogs par kha cig sgrog par byed
T02D1277:112b-30: // par rtogs so // do // de'i lam ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'am /
T02D1277:112b-31: chos kyi phyag rgya la sa bcu'i rim pas gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1277:112b-32: phyis rdo rje 'dzin par bstan to //
T02D1277:112b-33: kha cig tu gnas la sogs par rdo rje la
T02D1277:112b-34: sogs pa'i rigs las byung ba ye shes thob pa'i
T02D1277:112b-35: nus pa can las kyi phyag rgya zla ba gcig
T02D1277:112b-36: la sogs par longs spyad cing sbyar ba las /
T02D1277:112b-37: bde ba chen po dang snying rje'i rang bzhin mtha' yas par rgya shing 'gog pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1277:112b-38: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1277:112b-39: bde ba chen po'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
T02D1277:112b-40: 'dzin gyi mngon sum du byas nas mchog gi gnas
T02D1277:113a-0: yon tan gyi tshogs kyi lan bu dang rgyan gyi dga' bar byed ba can ma sprul @113a * //
T02D1277:113a-1: pa'i tshogs thun mtshams su yang dag par 'gro ba'i
T02D1277:113a-2: don byed pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i lus
T02D1277:113a-3: can zla ba gcig gis ster bar byed do //
T02D1277:113a-4: yang na zla ba drug gam bdun du rig ma'i
T02D1277:113a-5: brtul zhugs spyad nas bdag nyid kyang lha'i tshul du
T02D1277:113a-6: byas nas phul du byung ba'i rnal 'byor rnam par
T02D1277:113a-7: shes pa gang gi tshe rab tu 'bar ba'i snang
T02D1277:113a-8: bas nyin mo dang mtshan mo rab tu 'brel pa
T02D1277:113a-9: dang 'dra bar rgyun du de kho na nyid kyi
T02D1277:113a-10: rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs par nus pa de'i
T02D1277:113a-11: tshe / phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu kye rdo
T02D1277:113a-12: rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1277:113a-13: tshe / spyad pa'i phyir / snga dro dang thun
T02D1277:113a-14: mtshams la sogs par snyoms 'jug gi rtsol ba brtsam
T02D1277:113a-15: tshe / spyad pa'i phyir / par bya'o // rnal
T02D1277:113a-16: 'byor gyi rim pa srid pa gsum po thams cad
T02D1277:113a-17: gcig pa'i rang bzhin kun du mtshungs pa dang kun
T02D1277:113a-18: du mtshungs pa ma yin pa gcig pa'i ngo bor
T02D1277:113a-20: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa ro mnyam pa'i
T02D1277:113a-21: bde ba chen po'i mthus snang ba dang snang ba
T02D1277:113a-22: rab tu mched pa dang 'dra bar nyin mtshan rtag
T02D1277:113a-23: tu gnas pa'o // de nas rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D1277:113a-24: mthar rtogs pa dga' ba bzhi pa'i de kho na
T02D1277:113a-25: nyid mngon sum du byed pa skya rengs shar ba'i
T02D1277:113a-26: dus su sgrub pa pos mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1277:113a-27: tu gnas pa'o // // 'dus pa phyi mar yang /
T02D1277:113a-28: bsgrub bya sgrub thabs kun du sbyor //
T02D1277:113a-29: gang zhig bsten las gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D1277:113a-30: rdo rje padma mnyan du sbyor //
T02D1277:113a-31: nye ba'i sgrub par brjod par bya //
T02D1277:113a-32: h'um phat yi ge yang dag ldan //
T02D1277:113a-33: g-yo ba'i sgrub par rab tu brjod //
T02D1277:113a-34: rang gi bde ba zhi rang bzhin //
T02D1277:113a-35: sgrub pa chen por brjod par bya //
T02D1277:113a-36: zhes thabs kyi yan lag bzhi rnams kyis dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang /
T02D1277:113a-37: rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo'i go 'phang gi thabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang /
T02D1277:113a-38: bsten par bya ba'i chos so zhes pa 'dis 'di
T02D1277:113a-39: nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i rim par 'dod do
T02D1277:113a-40: // de nyid gal te las kyi phyag rgya la
T02D1277:113a-41: snyoms par zhugs na de rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i
T02D1277:113a-42: phyir snga ma dang 'dra bar gtum mo'i me shin
T02D1277:113a-43: tu 'bar ba des bzhu ba'i ri bong can lhan
T02D1277:113b-0: cig skyes pa'i mthu las @113b te /
T02D1277:113b-1: 'di'i rnal 'byor ni las kyi gtum mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1277:113b-2: du brjod par bya ste shes rab dang bcas pa'o
T02D1277:113b-3: // shes rab ma med pa'i ni lha'i rnam par
T02D1277:113b-4: bsgom pa'am nang du bsgom pa thams cad du brjod
T02D1277:113b-5: // pa ste / rtag tu gtum mo 'bar ba nyid kyi rgyus lhan cig skyes pa shar pa /
T02D1277:113b-6: dbang bskur ba'i dus su yang phyi'i rig ma dang
T02D1277:113b-7: snyoms par zhugs pa las 'bar ba ni 'di'i gtum
T02D1277:113b-8: mo ste snga ma dang 'dra bar lhan cig skyes
T02D1277:113b-9: pa shar ba las kyang 'char ba ni las kyi
T02D1277:113b-11: 'o na kyang lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1277:113b-12: de'i gdong mdzes pa'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02D1277:113b-13: de'i phyir las kyi gtum mo'i rnal 'byor 'di gdong la ma yin pa kho na'o //
T02D1277:113b-14: 'o na kyang kha cig ni slar yang sngon bzhin
T02D1277:113b-15: du rlung las rnam par rgyal zhing goms pa las
T02D1277:113b-16: srog rtsol ba'i bdag po thob pa ma yin zhing
T02D1277:113b-17: rlung gi lam tshad med pa'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1277:113b-18: la'am / yang na 'dzin pa las gtum mo de
T02D1277:113b-19: rab tu 'bar ba las byung ba'i bde ba chen
T02D1277:113b-20: po 'di ni las kyi gtum mo'i rnal 'byor du
T02D1277:113b-21: la'am / gsungs so // gal te thig le'i rnal
T02D1277:113b-22: 'byor gyis sems gnas par byed cing grub pa thams
T02D1277:113b-23: cad kyi snang ba mched par 'dod na /
T02D1277:113b-24: de'i tshe lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dud
T02D1277:113b-25: pa'i khung bu rnams la aam yig la sogs pa'i
T02D1277:113b-27: gsang ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rlung gis me yang dag par bskul bas /
T02D1277:113b-28: gtum mo'i rang bzhin aam yig 'bar ba'i 'od zer
T02D1277:113b-29: gyis h'um yig la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum kun
T02D1277:113b-30: nas zhu bas / aom yig dang lhan cig dbyer
T02D1277:113b-31: med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1277:113b-32: gyi thig le'i gzugs su bsgom zhing /
T02D1277:113b-33: bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na spro bar bya ste /
T02D1277:113b-34: de las de nyid phra mo 'od zer gyi re
T02D1277:113b-35: kh'a dag 'bar zhing gcig tu 'bar ba bzhin du
T02D1277:113b-37: de'i 'od kyis zhu ba'i bdud rtsis gang zhing 'phro ba'i thig ler gyur nas /
T02D1277:113b-38: de'ang 'od zer dkar po'i re kh'a can du gyur te /
T02D1277:114a-0: de nas sems thig le de son pa de srid du blta @114a * //
T02D1277:114a-2: slar yang brtan pa thob pa'i mtshan ma nye bar dmigs pa ni srid du'o //
T02D1277:114a-3: de'i nye bar dmigs pa dang brtan pa ni 'od
T02D1277:114a-4: zer gyi re kh'a las mar me sna tshogs pa
T02D1277:114a-5: 'phro ba'i snang ba can du rnam par mthong zhing
T02D1277:114a-6: thams cad lag mthol gyi skyu ru ra lta bur
T02D1277:114a-7: mthong ste / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snang
T02D1277:114a-8: ba mched pa zhes pa thig le'i rnal 'byor ro
T02D1277:114a-9: mthong ste / // yang na snying ga'i sngags kyi
T02D1277:114a-10: 'od zer gyi tshogs las spros pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1277:114a-11: pas bkug par bya ba'i 'jig rten gsum nang du
T02D1277:114a-12: thig le'i rnam pa'i h'um yig de la gzhag par
T02D1277:114a-13: mthong ste / // bya ste / yid ji srid 'dod par ro //
T02D1277:114a-14: de'i rjes su spro ba'i lam gyi rim pas lus
T02D1277:114a-15: dang ngag dang sems kyi rdo rje'i mthar thug par
T02D1277:114a-16: ro // de'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dbugs 'jug pa'i tshul gyis kun du bsdus te /
T02D1277:114a-17: sa bon gyi thig le la myur du gzhug cing
T02D1277:114a-18: ji ltar brjod pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1277:114a-19: ro // 'khor lo bsgom pa la ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1277:114a-20: slar yang spro ba'i tshul gyis 'od zer 'phros pas 'jig rten snang bar byas te /
T02D1277:114a-21: de nyid la bsres shing 'gro ba'i don byed bzhin
T02D1277:114a-22: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang dbugs 'jug pa'i
T02D1277:114a-23: tshul gyis snying gar bcug nas ji srid 'dod par
T02D1277:114a-24: bsgom par bya'o zhes pa 'di ni /
T02D1277:114a-25: mchog gi thig le'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1277:114a-26: yang na ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i 'od zer rnams
T02D1277:114a-27: aa ba dh'u t'ir song nas bde ba chen po'i
T02D1277:114a-28: khor lor gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bzhu ste
T02D1277:114a-29: de nyid las 'ongs pa snying ga'i h'um yig gi
T02D1277:114a-30: thig le la / de'i bdag nyid kyi rdul phra
T02D1277:114a-31: rab kyi gzugs su gnas par bsam par bya'o zhes
T02D1277:114a-32: pa gzhan rnams kyi thig le'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1277:114a-33: de'i rjes su phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni
T02D1277:114a-34: mchog tu sems gnas par byed pa'i thabs so zhes
T02D1277:114a-35: pa ste / de bzhin kho nar aam yig la
T02D1277:114a-36: sogs pa'i yi ge rnams zhu ba ro gcig tu
T02D1277:114a-37: gyur pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang
T02D1277:114a-38: chub kyi sems kyi thig le yungs kar gyi 'bras
T02D1277:114a-39: bu'i tshad tsam la gsal bar rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan
T02D1277:114b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la ltos pas ni /
T02D1277:114b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo la'o //
T02D1277:114b-3: de las zags te padmar gnas pa'am /
T02D1277:114b-4: yang na sna'i rtse mo la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1277:114b-5: ji ltar gsungs pa'i brtan par gnas pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas /
T02D1277:114b-6: bcom ldan 'das de'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'am dkyil 'khor
T02D1277:114b-7: spro bar bya'o zhes pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1277:114b-8: ro // de nyid lha'i rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D1277:114b-9: bar ma chad par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis sam /
T02D1277:114b-10: gzhan gyi rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar nus par 'od gsal la gzhug pa dang /
T02D1277:114b-13: skyo bar gyur pa na sngags bzla ba'i cho ga 'dis sam /
T02D1277:114b-14: gzhan du yang sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya ste /
T02D1277:114b-15: de la shes rab kyi zhal las 'thon pa'i 'od zer de rnams rang gi zhal du zhugs te /
T02D1277:114b-16: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon nas lha mo'i padmar zhugs /
T02D1277:114b-17: slar yang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du rab tu zhugs te /
T02D1277:114b-18: sngags kyi rgyun ma chad pa nyid du gzhug par
T02D1277:114b-19: bya'o zhes pa khyogs kyis bzlas par mtsho skyes kyi
T02D1277:114b-21: gzhan du ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1277:114b-22: nga rgyal gyis sngags kyi phreng ba rang gi zhal
T02D1277:114b-23: nyid du zhugs pa rdo rje'i lam nas padmar sor
T02D1277:114b-24: aa ba dh'u t'i'i lam nas byung ste /
T02D1277:114b-25: bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal nas spros nas /
T02D1277:114b-26: rang gi zhal gyi sgor rab tu zhugs pa de
T02D1277:114b-27: bzhin kho nar 'khor bar bsgoms te bzla'o zhes pa
T02D1277:114b-28: lhod cing zhi ba'i yi ge khyogs kyis bzlas par
T02D1277:114b-29: brjod do // 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal du zhugs te /
T02D1277:114b-30: rang gi zhal du 'ong ba tsam gyi khyad par
T02D1277:114b-31: gyis yi ge mkhregs shing rtsub pa ni khro bo'i
T02D1277:114b-32: bzlas pa ste / snying po la sogs pa mchog
T02D1277:114b-33: tu drag por brjod pa'i phyir khro bo'i bzlas pa'o
T02D1277:114b-34: bzlas pa ste / // yang na snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig la yongs su bskor te /
T02D1277:114b-35: gnas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba mar me'i
T02D1277:114b-36: phreng ba lta bu bltas te myur bar 'khor bar
T02D1277:114b-37: dmigs la / dam pa ma yin pa'i rtogs pa spangs nas bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1277:114b-38: aom tree lo kya a'a kshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:115a-2: 'di'i yang h'um yig gsum thung bar brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyud dang de'i 'grel bar gsungs so //
T02D1277:115a-3: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma phul nas
T02D1277:115a-4: smon lam yang byas te ji ltar bde bar gnas
T02D1277:115a-5: par bya'o // thun mtshams su gyur par bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs las langs te /
T02D1277:115a-6: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1277:115a-7: mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams su yang thams cad byas
T02D1277:115a-8: nas gnyid 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du lhag par
T02D1277:115a-10: tho rangs kyi thun mtshams su spyan ma la sogs
T02D1277:115a-11: pa'i lha mo bzhis rdo rje'i glus rab tu sad
T02D1277:115a-12: de // bzhengs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad bya'o //
T02D1277:115a-13: de nas grong khyer bskyod pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1277:115a-14: aom aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:115a-16: myur bar shes rab dang bcas pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs su bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1277:115a-17: de'i thugs kar padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsams te /
T02D1277:115a-18: de'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams
T02D1277:115a-19: su g-yas skor du ji lta ba'i rim pas aa
T02D1277:115a-20: ka tsa ta zhes pa'i yi ge dang /
T02D1277:115a-21: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su ta pa ya sha zhes so //
T02D1277:115a-22: dbus kyi ze 'bru la shar du sv'a /
T02D1277:115a-25: thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D1277:115a-26: 'di rnams kyi yang 'od zer lcags byu'i rnam par
T02D1277:115a-27: dag pa ba spu'i khung bu rnams las 'thon te
T02D1277:115a-28: / bsgrub bya bkug cing sgrub pa po'i rkang pa
T02D1277:115a-29: dag gi 'og tu byas nas 'di rnams nyid dbang
T02D1277:115a-30: du bya'o zhes bsams nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1277:115a-31: 'bum bzlas pa las grong khyer bskyod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1277:115a-32: dbang du bya ba'i sgrub pa'i don du ni /
T02D1277:115a-33: brjod pa'i rim pas sngon du bsnyen pa'i don du 'bum bzlas pa byas te /
T02D1277:115a-34: dung khrod du tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas nas tshogs
T02D1277:115a-35: rnams kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po gsad
T02D1277:115a-36: par 'dod pas de'i phyir ka gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-0: de nas gnas kha cig tu phyin nas @115b shar du mgo gzhag ste /
T02D1277:115b-1: mtho ba'i sngas la nyal zhing thod pa m'a ma
T02D1277:115b-2: k'is gang ba rkang pa'i mthil la kun du reg
T02D1277:115b-3: par byas nas gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-4: phyis ldang ba na de thams cad 'thungs nas thogs
T02D1277:115b-5: kyi 'khor lo'i gnas mtha' dag tu nye bar thugs
T02D1277:115b-6: nas slar yang khri bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-7: kye rdo rje la som nyi med pa'i rnal 'byor bas thams cad du rnam par sbyong bar bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-8: de nas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rim pas a'a li k'a li'i bzlas pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-9: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha'i sgras a'a
T02D1277:115b-10: li k'a li don gyis thob pas brjod par bya'o
T02D1277:115b-18: aar a'ar ao aoo aal a'al ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a ba b'a la l'a /
T02D1277:115b-19: zhes pa spro ba'i rim pas dbugs 'jug pa dang a'a li bzlas so //
T02D1277:115b-20: ka k'a kha kh'a ga g'a gha gh'a nga ng'a
T02D1277:115b-21: tsa ts'a tsha tsh'a dza dz'a dzha dzh'a nya ny'a
T02D1277:115b-22: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a
T02D1277:115b-23: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a
T02D1277:115b-24: pa p'a pha ph'a ba b'a bha bh'a ma m'a
T02D1277:115b-25: da d'a dha dh'a na n'a sa s'a nypa nyp'a
T02D1277:115b-26: sha sh'a thka thk'a sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:115b-27: zhes rlung 'gro bas k'a li bzlas so //
T02D1277:115b-28: a'a li k'a li 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum
T02D1277:115b-29: skyes par byed pa'i sngags pas gcig dang slar yang
T02D1277:115b-30: gcig gi tshad tsam du bya ste /
T02D1277:115b-34: rim pa 'di yang dpal rdo rje snying po'i rab tu byed par mthong ngo //
T02D1277:115b-35: de nas dbang du bya ba'i man ngag ni myur
T02D1277:115b-36: bar chu skyes dmar po'i phung po mdzes pa la
T02D1277:115b-37: shes rab dang bcas pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs su
T02D1277:115b-39: snying kar 'dam skyes dmar po bcu drug phyed can gyi ze 'bru la /
T02D1277:115b-40: a'a li dang k'a ki yang dag par bsdus pa'i
T02D1277:115b-41: ngo bo sangs rgyas kyi yin tan la kun nas
T02D1277:115b-42: rjes su chags pa'i aam yig dang h'um yig dag
T02D1277:115b-43: yid la mngon par gris pa dag las shin tu
T02D1277:115b-44: dbang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od zer gyi phung
T02D1277:115b-45: po rnams nges par 'phros pas 'gro ba snang par
T02D1277:115b-46: byas te / de yis gzhan gyi lus dag yid
T02D1277:115b-47: rnams bkug nas aam yig dang h'um yig de dag
T02D1277:115b-48: nyid kyi thig le la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1277:115b-49: de nas de dag yongs su gyur pa dang bung
T02D1277:115b-50: pa yid grub ku ru binda'i gzugs brnyan can mchog
T02D1277:116a-0: gi snying rje'i sbrang rtsi 'thung bas myos @116a *
T02D1277:116a-2: des brjod pa'i shin tu ring ba'i h'um yig gi
T02D1277:116a-3: sgras bdag med dang he ru ka'i gzugs su bsam
T02D1277:116a-4: par bya zhing / de dang de'i snying gar le
T02D1277:116a-5: brgan rtsi'i tshon gyis btsos pa dang 'dra ba'i thig
T02D1277:116a-6: le yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la /
T02D1277:116a-7: aam yig dang h'um yig phra ba nges par bskyed do //
T02D1277:116a-8: de nas yid srub de dbugs kyi rlung 'byung ba'i shing rta la zhon te /
T02D1277:116a-9: sna'i bu ga nas 'thon nas sems can rnams kyi
T02D1277:116a-10: lus ngag yid rnams sbyangs shing bzung nas slar yang
T02D1277:116a-11: dbugs 'jug pa la zhon te lam de nyid nas
T02D1277:116a-12: snying ga'i padma'i ze 'bru la gzhug par bya zhing
T02D1277:116a-13: / de nas kun du bkug pa'i lus ngag yid
T02D1277:116a-14: rnams rang gi lus ngag yid la ting nge 'dzin
T02D1277:116a-16: de bzhin du yang dang yang du bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1277:116a-17: ji srid du rnam pa gsal bar gyur gyi bar du bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1277:116a-18: phyi nas bsgrub bya'am bsgrub bya mo'i snying gar son
T02D1277:116a-19: pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par
T02D1277:116a-20: bya zhing bung ba yid srub de de nyid kyis
T02D1277:116a-21: bkug ste / sna'i bu gnas de'i lus ngag yid
T02D1277:116a-22: kyi rang bzhin gyi snying ga'i padma la gzhug par
T02D1277:116a-23: bkug ste / bya'o // de nas yid srub de
T02D1277:116a-24: de'i lus kyi rang bzhin me tog gi rdul gyis
T02D1277:116a-25: bdag nyid dmar ser du byas /
T02D1277:116a-26: ngag gi rang bzhin gyi sbrang rtsi 'thungs /
T02D1277:116a-27: yid kyi me tog zos par byas te /
T02D1277:116a-28: de'i rjes su yid srub de sgrub pa po'i dbugs kyi rlung gis bkug ste /
T02D1277:116a-29: bsgrub bya'i sna'i bu ga nas bton la /
T02D1277:116a-30: sgrub pa po'i sna'i bu ga nas snying ga'i 'dam skyes la bcug ste /
T02D1277:116a-31: gshog pas gang bya ba de'i lus kyi me tog gi rdul sprugs /
T02D1277:116a-32: ngag gi sprang rtsi dang sems kyi me tog skyug par bsam mo //
T02D1277:116a-33: de ltar yang nas yang du rjes su chags pa dag lhag par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1277:116a-34: bsgoms pa'i mthar bsgrub bya'i med spel ba'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1277:116a-35: 'di dag gis kyang gang dag dga' bas myos par byed pa'i rig pa'i cha shas te /
T02D1277:116a-36: bdag nyid kyi mi dbang du byed pas snga bar khrus byas nas bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1277:116a-37: gal te mi'i 'dod pa la skyon mthong ba de'i tshe mi mthong ba'i skyon du 'gyur bas /
T02D1277:116a-38: de'i phyir dang po kho nar dam pa dang dam
T02D1277:116b-0: pa ma yin @116b pa'i yul la rnam par dpyad
T02D1277:116b-1: de bsgom par bya'o zhes pa bung ba yid srub
T02D1277:116b-2: kyi rim pa'o // zhi pa la sogs pa'i las
T02D1277:116b-3: rnams su sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams
T02D1277:116b-4: ni rgyud la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas legs
T02D1277:116b-5: par shes so zhes pas ma bris so //
T02D1277:116b-6: dur khrod la dgyes pa phyag gnyis pa kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ni /
T02D1277:116b-7: slar yang sngar bzhin thams cad byas te /
T02D1277:116b-8: snying gar zla ba la hr'i: yig sngon po las rdo rje /
T02D1277:116b-9: de'i lte ba'i nang du son pa'i zla ba la
T02D1277:116b-10: gnas pa'i hr'i: yig bsams nas de thams cad yongs
T02D1277:116b-11: su gyur pa las sngar brjod pa'i gzugs can gyi
T02D1277:116b-12: bcom ldan 'das nyid gcig pu bsgom par bya ste
T02D1277:116b-13: / ro la gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa la gar gyis gnas pa /
T02D1277:116b-14: mi'i pags pa'i gos can te /
T02D1277:116b-15: lhag ma ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D1277:116b-16: bzlas bya'i sngags ni shr'i he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hr'i:/
T02D1277:116b-17: sarba du sht'an mu dr'a pra bhanydza ka h'um phat /
T02D1277:116b-18: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud du gsungs so //
T02D1277:116b-19: de ltar sgom pa po la ltos nas bsdus shing
T02D1277:116b-20: gsal ba rig ma dang bcas pa las cig shos
T02D1277:116b-21: su gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das tsam gyi sgrub thabs
T02D1277:116b-22: brjod zin to // 'di'i yang rgyas pa gsal ba
T02D1277:116b-23: ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos kyi 'byung
T02D1277:116b-24: gnas sku gsung thugs dag pas zur gsum pa /
T02D1277:116b-25: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyis ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
T02D1277:116b-26: sku gsum sa gcig pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dang /
T02D1277:116b-27: chos kyi skye gnas chen po yin pa'i phyir 'og phra zhing steng yangs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1277:116b-28: de'i nang du dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su zla
T02D1277:116b-29: nyi kha sbyor la gnas pa'i hr'i: yig sngon po
T02D1277:116b-30: las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du zla
T02D1277:116b-31: ba la gnas pa'i hr'i: yig sngon po bsams nas
T02D1277:116b-33: chos kyi 'byung gnas mdzes pa'i nang du gnas pa'i
T02D1277:116b-34: sna tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje'i kha
T02D1277:116b-36: yam ram bam lam gi yi ge las skyes pa
T02D1277:116b-37: sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ser
T02D1277:116b-38: po'i mdog can / gzhu'i dbyibs kyi mchog ma gnyis la ba don gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1277:116b-39: zur gsum pa re phas mtshan pa /
T02D1277:116b-40: zlum po bum pas mtshan pa /
T02D1277:117a-1: rdo rje rtse gsum pas zur bzhi la mtshan pa'i
T02D1277:117a-2: rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1277:117a-3: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1277:117a-4: shes rab dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dag
T02D1277:117a-5: cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bsdus pa'i do bo /
T02D1277:117a-6: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs ma /
T02D1277:117a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dang so so'i skye bo dag
T02D1277:117a-8: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas
T02D1277:117a-10: de'i shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D1277:117a-11: yang dag par spong ba dang /
T02D1277:117a-13: dbang po rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1277:117a-14: sgo nyid ni byang chub kyi thabs nyid do //
T02D1277:117a-15: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dag pas sgo 'gram brgyad du ka ba ste /
T02D1277:117a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis nye ba'i ka ba'o //
T02D1277:117a-17: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pas
T02D1277:117a-18: gzhan gyi don gyi khur khyer ba sngar thob zin
T02D1277:117a-19: pa'i phyir ka ba'i steng du gdung bzhi'o //
T02D1277:117a-22: dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1277:117a-23: seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi
T02D1277:117a-24: dag pas brtan zhing mdzes pa'i stegs bu bzhi rnams
T02D1277:117a-25: so // bzod pa dang chos dang don dang sngags
T02D1277:117a-26: kyi gzungs rnam par dag pas ngos so sor ram
T02D1277:117a-27: so // / bden pa so so la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T02D1277:117a-29: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T02D1277:117a-30: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad
T02D1277:117a-31: cig gi dbye ba rnam par dag pas rtsa ba'i
T02D1277:117a-32: sgo'i ngos gnyis gnyis rnams su g-yas skor gyis lha
T02D1277:117a-33: mo gnyis gnyis rim pas gnas te /
T02D1277:117a-51: lha mo bcu drug rnams ni /
T02D1277:117b-6: dkar po'i mdog can ma rnams /
T02D1277:117b-7: rang rang gi ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul can /
T02D1277:117b-8: rang rang gi dang po'i yi ge las 'khrungs pa'o //
T02D1277:117b-9: brtse bas brlan zhing yangs pa'i bsod nams dang ye
T02D1277:117b-10: shes kyi tshogs kyi bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba
T02D1277:117b-11: rnam par dag pas bdud rtsis gang pa'i bum pa
T02D1277:117b-12: brgyad do // bsam pa'i dbang las rjes su 'jug pa'i mdo sde dang /
T02D1277:117b-19: de lta bu byung ba dang /
T02D1277:117b-23: gtan la phab pa'i sder grags pa'i yan lag bcu
T02D1277:117b-24: gnyis kyi dam pa'i chos kyi sgra thams cad du
T02D1277:117b-25: 'gro ba rnam par dag pas rlung gis bskyod pa'i
T02D1277:117b-26: ba dan la dril bu'i sgra dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:117b-27: ji lta bar sbyor zhing 'gro ba'i 'khor bar kun nas gdung ba zhi ba dag pas sam /
T02D1277:117b-28: rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag spangs pas gdugs dang /
T02D1277:117b-29: ji ltar bsod nams rnam par bkra ba'i rin po
T02D1277:117b-30: che la sogs pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi don phun
T02D1277:117b-31: sum tshogs pa sgrub pa dag pas bum pa bzang
T02D1277:117b-32: po dang dpag bsam gyi shing rnams so //
T02D1277:117b-33: rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1277:117b-34: pa'i bsgom pa'i lam rnam par dag pas do shal
T02D1277:117b-35: / nyon mongs pa rnam par sel ba'i phyir 'jig
T02D1277:117b-36: rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam rnam par dag pas do
T02D1277:117b-37: / shal phyed pa / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas zla ba /
T02D1277:117b-38: shes rab ye shes rnam par dag pas nyi ma /
T02D1277:117b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam gyi ye shes rnam par dag pas rnga yab /
T02D1277:117b-40: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog phun sum
T02D1277:117b-41: tshogs pa rnam par dag pas me tog gi phreng
T02D1277:117b-42: ba / me long gi ye shes rnam par dag pas me long ste /
T02D1277:117b-43: de ltar yang thams cad gsang chen gyi rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1277:117b-44: nyon mongs thams cad nges 'joms pa'i //
T02D1277:117b-45: do shal du ni yang dag bshad //
T02D1277:117b-46: nyon mongs rnam 'phrog do shal te //
T02D1277:118a-2: rab tu 'joms shing rnam sel ba //
T02D1277:118a-3: tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba'o //
T02D1277:118a-4: nyon mongs rnams kyi phyed 'phrog pa'i //
T02D1277:118a-5: do shal phyed pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1277:118a-6: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pa //
T02D1277:118a-7: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1277:118a-8: sems can kun don byed gyur pa'i //
T02D1277:118a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes brjod do //
T02D1277:118a-10: shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag / rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes //
T02D1277:118a-11: thar pa'i 'jig rten gzi brjid che //
T02D1277:118a-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya //
T02D1277:118a-13: kun rtog gnyis las nges grol ba'i //
T02D1277:118a-15: lam gyi ye shes khyad par ni //
T02D1277:118a-16: rnga yab tu ni yang dag bshad //
T02D1277:118a-17: de bzhin byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1277:118a-18: phreng ba me tog chun 'phyang ldan //
T02D1277:118a-20: blo gros phra ba dang rags pa dang bar ma
T02D1277:118a-21: rnams dang nges pa dang bral ba rnams la ji
T02D1277:118a-22: ltar 'os pa'i chos ston pa bsrung ba med pa
T02D1277:118a-23: dag pas bsrung ba med pa'i ba ku li'i phreng
T02D1277:118a-24: ba dmar po / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog
T02D1277:118a-25: tu dkar ba'i chos ston pa dag pas kra ma
T02D1277:118a-26: ba dmar po / sh'irsha / bsam gtan bzhi dag pas rta babs bzhi'o //
T02D1277:118a-27: chos ston pa'i mi mthun phyogs gcod pa dag pas chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1277:118a-37: 'jig rten las 'das pa dag pa brgyad do //
T02D1277:118a-38: lugs gzhan la bcu gnyis te /
T02D1277:118a-41: slar shes par byar med do //
T02D1277:118a-44: slar spang bar byar med do //
T02D1277:118a-50: slar bsgom par byar med do zhes rnam pa bcu
T02D1277:118a-51: gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su
T02D1277:118a-52: dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dag pa'o //
T02D1277:118a-53: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos tshad ma yongs su dag pa bsten pa'i drin las /
T02D1277:118b-0: mu stegs ngan pa'i ri @118b dgas dang ri dags
T02D1277:118b-1: mo chos dang dad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te lam
T02D1277:118b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa la mngon par sbyor
T02D1277:118b-4: ba dag pas mgrin pa bsnyengs pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1277:118b-5: ri dgas dang ri dgas mo'o //
T02D1277:118b-6: khrel yod pa dag pas ni bla re dang gos dang phreng ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1277:118b-7: thams cad nas so sor 'ching ba med pas yang
T02D1277:118b-8: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo
T02D1277:118b-9: rje'i tshul gyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
T02D1277:118b-10: ba dag pas rdo rje'i phreng ba /
T02D1277:118b-11: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi gzigs pa dag pas 'od zer 'bar ba /
T02D1277:118b-12: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dag pas sa'i kha dog la sogs pa ste /
T02D1277:118b-13: gzhan ni grags zin pa'i phyir ma bris so //
T02D1277:118b-14: 'di ltar khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par byas nas /
T02D1277:118b-15: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1277:118b-16: pas sngar bzhin bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das su bsgom
T02D1277:118b-17: par bya ste / sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1277:118b-18: gyi aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum ho
T02D1277:118b-19: yig dmar po gnyis kyi khongs su chud pa bar
T02D1277:118b-20: do'i sems can du grags pa kun du dga' ba
T02D1277:118b-21: bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas zhugs rdo
T02D1277:118b-22: rje'i lam nas lha mo'i padmar zhugs pa lto bar
T02D1277:118b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyang mthar shin tu chags pa chen
T02D1277:118b-25: pos rang gi rig ma dang bcas pa zhu bar
T02D1277:118b-26: gyur te / dngul chu dang mtshungs pa'i byang chub
T02D1277:118b-27: kyi sems kyi gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D1277:118b-29: de nas bar ma chad par byams pa chen po
T02D1277:118b-30: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin pukka s'i la sogs pa'i
T02D1277:118b-31: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bdag cag rnams mgon med
T02D1277:118b-32: do zhes yid la shin tu gcags pas /
T02D1277:118b-33: rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig / pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1277:118b-34: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1277:118b-35: bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod //
T02D1277:118b-36: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1277:118b-37: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1277:118b-38: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod //
T02D1277:118b-39: dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba //
T02D1277:118b-40: stong pa nyid la zhugs sam ci //
T02D1277:118b-41: khyod med phyogs ni ma 'tshal ba //
T02D1277:119a-2: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1277:119a-3: g-yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas //
T02D1277:119a-4: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad par //
T02D1277:119a-5: mi 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / ces rdo
T02D1277:119a-6: rje'i glu can rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba

T02D1277:119a-20: kyi sems kyi thig le brgyad las skyes pa'i gam
T02D1277:119a-21: tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam gi yi ge
T02D1277:119a-22: la sa skyes pa'i gri gug dang /

T02D1277:119b-0: @119b thod pa dang rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang /
T02D1277:119b-8: chags pa'i tshogs la sogs pa gcod pa dang /
T02D1277:119b-9: 'di rnams kyi dran pa gso ba dang /

T02D1277:119b-12: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i snying gar zla ba rnams la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa /

T02D1277:119b-22: de'i rjes su snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D1277:119b-23: rnams kyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo spros

T02D1277:119b-25: dza: zhes pas dgug / aom tso r'i pra be
T02D1277:119b-26: sha ya h'um zhes pa coo r'is bcug / aom
T02D1277:119b-27: bet'a l'i bandha ya bam zhes be t'a l'is bcings
T02D1277:119b-28: pa'i goo r'is / / aom ghasma r'i to sha
T02D1277:119b-29: ya ho: / zhes dbang du byas ta de nas
T02D1277:119b-31: phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la gnas pa'i go bo r'i la sogs pa rnams la /
T02D1277:119b-36: pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang go bo
T02D1277:119b-37: r'i la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyi rjes su
T02D1277:119b-38: rim pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyar
T02D1277:119b-39: rnam par dag pa ni brtag pa gnyis pa bzhin
T02D1277:119b-40: no // de nas go cha la sogs pa thams cad sngon bzhin nyid do //
T02D1277:119b-42: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das nyid la rang gi shes rab mas dbul te /
T02D1277:119b-43: 'khor gyi goo r'i la sogs pas ni lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas myong bar bya'o //
T02D1277:119b-44: slar yang 'dir khang pa brtsegs pa ni brtag pas so //
T02D1277:119b-45: dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa /
T02D1277:119b-46: bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med kyi /
T02D1277:120a-0: @120a * // mchod pa don yod grub par yang dag par bshad cing /
T02D1277:120a-1: rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems dpar rtag tu bsams te /

T02D1277:120a-5: 'jig rten gsum dus gcig tu dur khrod la dur khrod /
T02D1277:120a-6: khang pa brtsegs pa la khang pa brtsegs pa /
T02D1277:120a-7: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams la /
T02D1277:120a-8: goo r'i la sogs pa rang rang gi phyogs kyi
T02D1277:120a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi bsdu'i khung bu rnams su ste

T02D1277:120a-13: bdag med ma'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D1277:120a-21: ghasma r'i'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02D1277:120a-28: 'dir gang gi cho dam tshig gi bzlas pa byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02D1277:120a-29: snying ga'i sa bon las snying po'i sngags dang nye
T02D1277:120a-30: ba'i snying po'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ba dag brjod
T02D1277:120a-31: pa'i tshe / dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i chogs yang dag par spros /
T02D1277:120a-32: 'gro ba'i don byas nas sngags dang lhan cig pa nyid kyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis bkug ste /
T02D1277:120a-33: rlung 'jug pa de'i tshe de nyid snying ga'i sa bon la gzhug par bya zhing /
T02D1277:120a-34: lha rnams kyi sngags so sor brjod pa yongs su rdzogs pa na /
T02D1277:120a-35: re re nas spro zhing bsdu bar bya'o zhes pa dam tshig gi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1277:120a-36: gang yang brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
T02D1277:120a-43: sa spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs par byed pa
T02D1277:120a-44: la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do zhes
T02D1277:120a-45: gsungs pa'i phyir / 'dir yang bla ma dang phan
T02D1277:120a-46: tshun dbyer med par 'grogs pa'i man ngag las las
T02D1277:120a-47: rab tu rgyas pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D1277:120a-48: aam gi sa bon las skyes pa'i rdo rje ma
T02D1277:120b-0: ser mo @120b g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis thod pa
T02D1277:120b-1: dang kha tv'am ga / g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis
T02D1277:120b-2: rdo rje dang gri gug 'dzin pa can gyi snyid
T02D1277:120b-3: gar sa bon h'um ser po rnam par bsgoms te

T02D1277:120b-7: kyis cho ga ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya ste
T02D1277:120b-8: / 'di'i yang las kyi mthar so ma btang ba'i kham phor gnyis su /
T02D1277:120b-9: thod le kor ser bos bum pas mtshan pa'i chu'i
T02D1277:120b-10: dkyil 'khor zlum po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D1277:120b-11: rje dang / aom h'um badzre che ge mo stam bha ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:120b-12: zhes pa'i rig pa bris nas /
T02D1277:120b-13: gcig dur khrod kyi thal bas bkang ste /
T02D1277:120b-14: kham phor gzhan gyis kha sbyar bar byas pa'i steng du /
T02D1277:120b-15: dbang chen dkyil 'khor zung la phyogs su rdo rjes
T02D1277:120b-16: nye bar mtshan pa bris nas sa 'og tu bzhag
T02D1277:120b-17: nas / bud med rkang pa g-yon dang /
T02D1277:120b-18: skyes pa rkang pa g-yas kyis mnan pa'i ting nge
T02D1277:120b-19: 'dzin gyis gnas pa'i mthar sngags bzlas par bya ste
T02D1277:120b-20: / stong gis bsgrub bya rengs par byed do //
T02D1277:120b-21: aim las rdzogs pa'i dkar mo gur gum gyi mdog can zhags pa dang /
T02D1277:120b-25: snying gar son pa'i aam yig dmar po'i sa bon can bsams nas /
T02D1277:120b-27: zhes sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te /
T02D1277:120b-28: spel chig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis cho ga ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1277:120b-30: bsgrub bya dmar po skra grol ba man na nas /
T02D1277:120b-32: lcags kyus skye gnas phug nas bkug ste /
T02D1277:120b-33: rkang pa'i 'og tu 'gyel bar bsams nas /
T02D1277:120b-34: de'i skye gnas su aam yig dmar po de las
T02D1277:120b-35: me 'bar zhing rnam par 'bar bar bsam par bya'o
T02D1277:120b-36: // skyes pa la ni de bzhin kho nar snying gar ro //
T02D1277:120b-37: aom aam goo r'i aa mu k'i me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:120b-38: zhes bzlas pas nges par de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1277:120b-39: aim gi sa bon las skyes pa'i chu ma sngon mo thod pa dang /

T02D1277:121a-2: spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya'o //

T02D1277:121a-7: aa mu kam au tstsha ta ya kham h'um h'um
T02D1277:121a-10: mtshan mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do //
T02D1277:121a-11: au yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma

T02D1277:121a-21: aom dzr'im badzra d'a ki n'i che ge dang che ge dag bi dve sham ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:121a-22: dzr'im h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:121a-23: zhes bzlas pas rnam par sdang bar byed do //
T02D1277:121a-24: aam gi sa bon las skyes pa'i bdag med ma sngon mo /
T02D1277:121a-25: rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1277:121a-27: gri gug 'dzin pa'i snying gar nyi ma la bum yig sngon po can bsams te /
T02D1277:121a-30: spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis cho ga ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1277:121a-32: bram ze'i thod par dug dang ske tshe dang /
T02D1277:121a-33: sdigs mdzub kyi khrag gis 'khor lo zur drug pa zur rnams su h'um dang ldan zhing /
T02D1277:121a-34: dbus su aom bum nee ra a'a tmya aa mu
T02D1277:121a-35: ka dz'a ra ya bum h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a
T02D1277:121a-36: h'a / zhes pa'am nye bar 'tshe ba mtha' dag spel te bris nas bzlas te /
T02D1277:121a-37: phub ma'i me mdag la gdung bar bya ste /
T02D1277:121a-39: aam las skyes pa'i mkha' spyod ma /
T02D1277:121a-40: dkar mo lta bu'i snying gar h'um yig dmar po'i sa bon can bsam par byas nas /
T02D1277:121a-43: spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis cho ga ji ltar sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1277:121a-44: 'di'i yang las la bsgrub bya rlung dang me'i dkyil
T02D1277:121b-0: 'khor gyi steng du rnam par @121b 'bar bar bsams
T02D1277:121b-1: te / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1277:121b-2: zer gyi lcags kyu sna bug g-yon nas nges par

T02D1277:122a-0: pa'i rdo rje phag mo la mnyam par @122a *

T02D1277:122b-30: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya krishna dz'i m'u ta ba pu she /
T02D1277:122b-31: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne /
T02D1277:122b-32: a'adhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya /
T02D1277:122b-34: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1277:122b-35: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1277:122b-44: h'a h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:122b-46: slang yang 'dir dbus kyi bi tsu badzra la lhag
T02D1277:122b-47: pa'i sems kyi dbye ba tsam las kyang kye rdo
T02D1277:122b-48: rje bzhir nges par mthong ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02D1277:122b-49: rim pa'i bar ma chad pa ni bhr'um las skyes
T02D1277:122b-50: pa'i rdo rje gur rgya che ba ser po sdug
T02D1277:122b-51: bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang /
T02D1277:123a-1: yongs su skye ba shes pa'i shes pa bcu rnam
T02D1277:123a-2: par dag pas rtsibs bcu 'khor ba'i dbus su gnas
T02D1277:123a-3: pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du sna tshogs chu
T02D1277:123a-4: skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i zla ba dang
T02D1277:123a-5: nyi ma kha sbyar ba'i dbus su son pa'i h'um
T02D1277:123a-6: yig sngon po bsams nas lnga'i 'byung gnas kyi mngon
T02D1277:123a-7: par byang chub pa'i rim pas /
T02D1277:123a-8: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1277:123a-9: dbang po sngon po'i mdog can zhal gcig pa /
T02D1277:123a-10: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1277:123a-11: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis /
T02D1277:123a-12: rang bzhin gyi rig ma la kun nas 'khyud pa /
T02D1277:123a-13: g-yon brkyang gi zhabs kyis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan can mnan pa /
T02D1277:123a-14: rnam par bkra ba'i na bza' dang rgyan gyis brgyan
T02D1277:123a-15: pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid du rnam
T02D1277:123a-16: par bsgoms nas / rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1277:123a-17: khro bo bcu rjes su spros te /
T02D1277:123a-18: de la shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su rim pas /
T02D1277:123a-23: nag po dkar po dmar po sngon po'i mdog can /
T02D1277:123a-27: gyes pa'i rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:123a-28: mi'u thung gsus khyim che zhing khro ba klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1277:123a-29: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1277:123a-30: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02D1277:123a-34: mi bskyod pa rnams kyi cod pan can /
T02D1277:123a-35: stag gi pags pa'i shams [*sham] thabs 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D1277:123a-36: me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su /
T02D1277:123a-37: 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang /
T02D1277:123a-39: mi g-yo ba rnams cher gnag pa /
T02D1277:123a-45: mi g-yo ba dag gos dam pa dang /
T02D1277:123a-46: rin po che la sogs pas brgyan cing sgeg pa /
T02D1277:123a-47: rin po che'i cod pan dag go //
T02D1277:123a-48: dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dag gshin rje mthar byed bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba dag go //
T02D1277:123b-0: 'og gi @123b rtsibs su gnod mdzes nag po gtun shing 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:123b-1: mi bskyod pas mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can no //
T02D1277:123b-2: steng gi rtsibs su gtsug tor ser po 'khor lo
T02D1277:123b-3: 'dzin pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa'i rin
T02D1277:123b-5: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi ni mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
T02D1277:123b-6: khro bo bcu po 'di rnams sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D1277:123b-7: dang nyi ma la g-yon brkyang gi zhabs kyis gnas
T02D1277:123b-8: pa / g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyi snying ga'i phyogs
T02D1277:123b-9: su khu tshur gyi sdigs 'dzub [?] kyis klu'i zhags
T02D1277:123b-11: de ltar gyur pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par
T02D1277:123b-12: bsgoms nas de'i dbus su rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs
T02D1277:123b-14: chos kyi 'byung gnas sngar brjod pa'i gzugs can du rnam par bsams te /
T02D1277:123b-15: gzhan thams cad du gsungs pa'i rim pas sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1277:123b-17: khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs pa can gyi kye rdo rje bzhi po la yang blta bar bya'o //
T02D1277:123b-18: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams su bskyed
T02D1277:123b-19: pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gcig gis rgyun du nges
T02D1277:123b-20: pa bar ma chad par bsgom par byas pa'i rnal
T02D1277:123b-21: 'byor gyis gsal ba las kyang gsal bar gyur pa
T02D1277:123b-22: na / gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma rnams kyis ji
T02D1277:123b-23: srid du sgyu ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar
T02D1277:123b-24: spros pa med cing kun du gsal bar 'gyur ba
T02D1277:123b-25: na / ste / de ltar yang brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
T02D1277:123b-26: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1277:123b-27: brtul zhugs can gyi spros pa bsgom //
T02D1277:123b-28: spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas //
T02D1277:123b-29: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //
T02D1277:123b-30: ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang //
T02D1277:123b-31: ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin par //
T02D1277:123b-32: rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1277:123b-33: dkyil 'khor nyid du ni de bzhin 'dod //
T02D1277:123b-34: de'i phyir 'phral du sa bcu'i dbang phyug bden pa
T02D1277:123b-35: gnyis gcig pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
T02D1277:123b-36: po'i sa bdud 'joms pa zhes so //
T02D1277:123b-37: bsgom pa gzhan gyis kyang rnal 'byor ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel ba'i ched dang /
T02D1277:123b-38: bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du yang ji ltar
T02D1277:123b-39: rnyed pa'i phyir mchod pas bcom ldan 'das mchod par
T02D1277:124a-1: pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02D1277:124a-2: kye rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas
T02D1277:124a-3: tho rangs kyi dus su gnas ji lta bar phyag
T02D1277:124a-4: dar la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1277:124a-5: sa'i cha shas rnams la lag pa reg ste /
T02D1277:124a-6: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-7: zhes pas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1277:124a-8: der bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs te /
T02D1277:124a-9: de dang de'i sa gzhir mos pas /
T02D1277:124a-12: 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa dang /
T02D1277:124a-13: 'du ba dang nye ba'i 'du ba dang /
T02D1277:124a-17: nye ba'i dur khrod ces brjod de /
T02D1277:124a-18: mandala gru bzhi pa byas nas /
T02D1277:124a-19: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pas khor yug byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1277:124a-20: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi tishtha ntu sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-21: zhes pas mandala gyi dbus su me tog gcig gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1277:124a-22: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1277:124a-23: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum kun du bskyod pa
T02D1277:124a-24: dpa' bo lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba
T02D1277:124a-25: spyan drangs te / de la mtshungs pa med pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du phul te /
T02D1277:124a-26: h'um yig las skyes shing yi ge gsum gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pa /
T02D1277:124a-27: aom a'a: h'um he badzra ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-28: zhes pas dang por bcom ldan 'das la me tog gcig dbul lo //
T02D1277:124a-29: phyi nas snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dag gis so //
T02D1277:124a-30: aom a'a: nee ra a'atma ye badzra pushpe aam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-31: zhes pas mchod pa byas nas aom aam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-32: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u /
T02D1277:124a-37: zhes pa'i sngags dag gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1277:124a-38: gnyis ka'i spyi bor aom a'a:/
T02D1277:124a-39: aaksho bhya ya badzra pushpe h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-40: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su /
T02D1277:124a-41: aom a'a: goo ra+ye badzra pushpe gam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-42: aom goo r'i h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124a-43: 'di dag gis goo r'i mchod par bya'o //
T02D1277:124a-44: de ltar yi ge gsum gyis rang rang gi sa
T02D1277:124a-45: bon gyi yi ge dang rnam par spel ba'i tsoo
T02D1277:124a-46: r'i la sogs pa lhag par mchod par bya ste
T02D1277:124a-47: / phyi nas aom yig dang lhan cig bod pa'i
T02D1277:124a-48: tshig gis phul nas h'um h'um h'um phat kyi yi
T02D1277:124b-0: ge dang sv'a h'a'i mtha' @124b can gyis mchod par
T02D1277:124b-1: / bya'o // de ltar pushpe'i gnas su dh'u pe
T02D1277:124b-2: la sogs rnams kyis so so'i ming bcug ste dbul
T02D1277:124b-3: / bya'o // bar bya ste / de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta su la li ta /
T02D1277:124b-4: na mi tee re na m'a mi /
T02D1277:124b-6: shr'i he ru ka n'a tham dza: h'um bam ho: pra t'i tstsha mam /
T02D1277:124b-7: ku su ma aanydza li n'a th'a: ho zhes pas me tog snyim pas phul nas 'dud par bya'o //
T02D1277:124b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza me gha
T02D1277:124b-9: pra sa ra sa mu he spha ra h'i mam
T02D1277:124b-10: ga ga na kham h'um sa manta sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:124b-11: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1277:124b-13: bdud kyi sgyu ma rab 'joms shing //
T02D1277:124b-14: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1277:124b-15: rnam par 'phrul pa'i rang bzhin sku //
T02D1277:124b-16: kye yi rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
T02D1277:124b-17: ces pas phyag byas nas ji ltar nus pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1277:124b-18: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D1277:124b-19: smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston //
T02D1277:124b-20: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
T02D1277:124b-21: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1277:124b-22: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang //
T02D1277:124b-23: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas ni //
T02D1277:124b-24: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur ba shog / smon lam byas nas /
T02D1277:124b-25: de nas cho ga lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02D1277:124b-26: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1277:124b-27: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1277:124b-30: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1277:124b-31: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1277:124b-34: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho /
T02D1277:124b-35: bha ga b'an sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a
T02D1277:124b-36: me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D1277:124b-38: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad /
T02D1277:124b-39: 'di ltar rjes mthun dngos grub stsol //
T02D1277:124b-40: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D1277:124b-41: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1277:124b-42: aom badzra mu: zhes gshegs su gsol /
T02D1277:124b-43: de ltar phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02D1277:124b-45: phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang mtshungs par bya ste /
T02D1277:124b-46: dang por yi ge gsum gyis mchod par byas nas rang rang gi sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1277:124b-47: rdo rje phag mo la'ang bdag med ma yis dbul lo //
T02D1277:124b-48: phyag bcu drug pa la ni rkang pa brgyad pa'i
T02D1277:125a-0: mchod pa'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya @125a *
T02D1277:125a-2: aom aashn'a na n'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-3: aom pidho rdhva ke sha partma ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-4: aom tsa tu rbidsha ti ne tra ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-5: aom sho da sha bhu dz'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-6: aom krishna dz'i m'u ta ba pu she h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-7: aom ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-8: aom a'adhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-9: aom aardhe ndu dam shtr'i ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:125a-10: zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod par byas nas smon lam
T02D1277:125a-11: la sogs pa sngar bzhin byas te gshegs su gsol
T02D1277:125a-12: bar bya'o // de nas kha zas kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1277:125a-13: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dang bor bza' ba dang thug pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1277:125a-14: cho ga bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i chang g-yon pa'i srin mdzub kyis gtor zhing /
T02D1277:125a-15: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su snying ga'i sa
T02D1277:125a-16: bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1277:125a-17: spyan drangs pa'am / snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa yang rung ste /
T02D1277:125a-18: sngar brjod pa'i sngags rnams la zas kyi dngos po'i ming spel ba rnams kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1277:125a-19: phyi nas gshegs su gsol la dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyis kha cung zad dag par byas te /
T02D1277:125a-20: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i rnam pas gtor ma phul nas /
T02D1277:125a-21: lte ba'i thab khung gi mes reg pas kha zas rnams zhu zhing babs nas /
T02D1277:125a-22: snying gar gnas pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' 'am /
T02D1277:125a-23: lte ba'i padma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i 'bar ba'i
T02D1277:125a-24: phreng ba can gyi aam yig la thim pas tshim
T02D1277:125a-25: par bya'o zhes pa phyi'i dngos po rnams kyi nang
T02D1277:125a-26: gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1277:125a-27: de nas mthar aom autstshishta badzra aa dhi tishtha ai mam ba lim /
T02D1277:125a-28: grihna grihna h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02D1277:125a-29: ces pas lhag ma'i gtor ma byin nas zas dor bar bya'o //
T02D1277:125a-30: phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa med pa'i slar yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni /
T02D1277:125a-31: sngar bzhin rlung gis sbar te /
T02D1277:125a-32: rtog pa mtha' dag gi mun pa dang sgrib par byed pa rnams /
T02D1277:125a-33: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thab tu shin tu gtum pa'i gtum mos bsregs shing /
T02D1277:125a-34: byang chub kyi sems kyi zas kyi sbyin sreg gis sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1277:125b-0: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag @125b nyid dang /
T02D1277:125b-1: nyi ma dang zla ba ro mnyam par gyur pa shin tu 'bar bas gang bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1277:125b-3: 'jig rten pa'i mngon par mtho ba'i sar gyur pa bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg ste /
T02D1277:125b-4: skad cig so sor goms pas 'thob bo //
T02D1277:125b-5: da ni gtor ma brjod par bya ste /
T02D1277:125b-6: dri dang me tog la sogs pa g-yas su dang /
T02D1277:125b-7: mdun du sha ka ta dang /
T02D1277:125b-8: bha ra la sogs pa'i snod du nya sha dang /
T02D1277:125b-9: dzambu di ka la sogs pa dang /
T02D1277:125b-11: chu khyor ba gsum dang ldan par bya zhing /
T02D1277:125b-12: ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyang ldan par byas te bzhag la /
T02D1277:125b-14: bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas bdud rtsir byas te /
T02D1277:125b-15: de kho na nyid gsum gyi chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1277:125b-16: dkar po dmar po nag po gsum gyi khung bur
T02D1277:125b-17: gnas pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa can
T02D1277:125b-18: steng nas steng du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1277:125b-19: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i goo r'i /
T02D1277:125b-20: aom goo r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa ri
T02D1277:125b-21: b'a r'a na a'a karsha ya dza: zhes pas bkug
T02D1277:125b-22: / aom tsoo r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa
T02D1277:125b-23: ri wa' r'a na pra be sha ya h'um zhes
T02D1277:125b-24: tsoo r'i sa padma rnams su bcug / aom be
T02D1277:125b-25: t'a l'i aindra aa d'i na sa pa ri b'a
T02D1277:125b-26: r'a na bandha ya bam zhes be t'a l'i spros
T02D1277:125b-28: aom ghasma r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa ri
T02D1277:125b-29: b'a r'an pra be sha ya ho: zhes pas dbang
T02D1277:125b-30: du byas te / de la chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus ma la gnas pa'i padma'i 'dab ma la /
T02D1277:125b-32: mig stong ldan pa dkar po rdo rje dang sdigs
T02D1277:125b-33: mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa glang po che sa
T02D1277:125b-34: srung gi pu dkar po la zhon pa /
T02D1277:125b-35: lho'i 'dab ma la gshin rje nag po /
T02D1277:125b-36: dbyug pa dang sdigs mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa ma he la zhon pa /
T02D1277:125b-37: nub kyi 'dab mar chu lha dkar po chu srin la zhon pa /
T02D1277:125b-38: sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:125b-40: byang gi 'dab ma la lus ngan ser po lus rags pa /
T02D1277:125b-41: gter la gnas pa b'i dza p'u ra dang /
T02D1277:125b-43: de rnams thams cad rin po che'i rgyan dang rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:125b-44: gshin rje nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02D1277:126a-0: dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar dbang phyug @126a * //
T02D1277:126a-3: ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:126a-4: rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag rgya can /
T02D1277:126a-5: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1277:126a-7: goo r'i la mnyam par 'khyud pa /
T02D1277:126a-8: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1277:126a-9: me'i 'dab mar me lha shin tu dmar ba lto ba 'phyang ba /
T02D1277:126a-11: smin ma dang ral pa dmar ser can /
T02D1277:126a-12: bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag can /
T02D1277:126a-13: nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1277:126a-14: bden bral gyi 'dab mar srin po'i bdag po sngon po ro la zhon pa /
T02D1277:126a-15: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1277:126a-16: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa /
T02D1277:126a-17: gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126a-18: ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:126a-19: bden bral gyi 'dab mar rlung lha sngon po rlung yab 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126a-21: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1277:126a-22: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:126a-24: ze 'bru la sa'i lha mo ser mo rin po che'i gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:126a-26: g-yas pas dam bcas pa sngon du nye bar 'gro
T02D1277:126a-27: ba'i phyag can zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od
T02D1277:126a-28: can yi dgas dang mun pa can gyis bskor te
T02D1277:126a-29: gnas pa'o // steng du gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar /
T02D1277:126a-30: zla ba dkar po rta dkar po dang ldan pa'i ku mu ta'i shing rta la gnas pa /
T02D1277:126a-31: phyag gnyis kyis zla bas mtshan pa'i ku mu ta 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126a-32: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1277:126a-33: lhor nyi ma nyi mas mtshan pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126a-34: rta ljang gu'i shing rta la gnas pa /
T02D1277:126a-35: rang gi gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1277:126a-36: nub la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
T02D1277:126a-37: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams su rim pas sa skyes
T02D1277:126a-38: dmar po ra la zhon pa /
T02D1277:126a-40: g-yas na chu gri dang g-yon pas mi mgo za ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:126a-41: lhag pa ljang gu mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126a-43: pur bu ser po bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1277:126a-44: rin po che'i pa tra dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:126b-0: pa sangs dkar @126b po bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126b-2: spen pa nag po bgrang phreng dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126b-4: sgra gcan dmar nag shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan can /
T02D1277:126b-5: skra dang sma ra dmar ser 'bar ba rnam par 'joms pa'i mche ba bzhi pa /
T02D1277:126b-6: nyi ma dang zla ba'i phyag can no //
T02D1277:126b-7: der de bzhin du tog dud ka / ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126b-9: ka ka ti tra 'dzin pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:126b-10: ze 'bru la tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi rgyas pa /
T02D1277:126b-11: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa'i phyag gis bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:126b-12: gzhan gyis mi 'jigs pa'i tshul can /
T02D1277:126b-13: g-yon gyis dbyu gu gsum pa dang /
T02D1277:126b-15: ngang pa la zhon pa ral pa can mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa /
T02D1277:126b-16: tshangs pas yongs su bskor ba mtshe ma dang dga' ldan pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1277:126b-18: tshangs pa mdun na 'don la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1277:126b-19: lha thams cad gnas par blta'o //
T02D1277:126b-20: chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og ma la gnas pa'i padma'i
T02D1277:126b-21: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su rim pas
T02D1277:126b-24: mtha' yas dang nor rgyas rnams ljang gu dang ser po dang /
T02D1277:126b-25: sngon po dang dkar po rnams so //
T02D1277:126b-26: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su 'jog po dang /
T02D1277:126b-35: rigs ldan ser po'o zhes kha cig go //
T02D1277:126b-36: de rnams gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa ze 'bru
T02D1277:126b-37: la lhag ma can dkar po de rnams thams cad
T02D1277:126b-38: kyi lus phyed mi la rin po che'i cod pan
T02D1277:126b-39: dang / rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lhag
T02D1277:126b-40: ma can bskor te gnas pa go cha dang bcas
T02D1277:126b-41: shing ral gri 'dzin pa'i lha ma yin dang dmyal
T02D1277:126b-42: ba pa'i sems can blta bar bya'o //
T02D1277:126b-43: dbus dang steng dang 'og gi padma la gnas pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te /
T02D1277:127a-1: gsung gi rang bzhin h'um aom a'a:'i yi ge las
T02D1277:127a-2: skyes pa rnams nag po dkar po dmar po'i mdog
T02D1277:127a-4: phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1277:127a-5: rang bzhin gyi rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1277:127a-6: g-yas brkyang gi stan la gnas pa rnams la /
T02D1277:127a-7: he ru ka'i gzugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur te /
T02D1277:127a-8: mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1277:127a-9: 'od dpag tu med pa rnams kyis rgyas btab par blta bar byas nas /
T02D1277:127a-10: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1277:127a-11: mig la sogs pa rnams su byin gyis brlabs te

T02D1277:127a-13: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dung chos kyi phyag rgyas mdun du de rnams la mchod yon phul nas /
T02D1277:127a-14: dung chos kyi phyag rgyas zhabs dag la zhabs bsil dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1277:127a-30: sgeg pa dang bcas shing dril bu'i sgra byas la /
T02D1277:127a-31: sngar bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i gtor ma'i zas rnams
T02D1277:127a-32: bdag nyid kyi lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas zos shing
T02D1277:127a-34: de rnams kyang de bzhin kho nar de myong bar byed pa'o zhes bsams te /
T02D1277:127a-49: zhes pas zhal zas su byas nas dril bu gnas gsum rnams su dkrol bar byas te /
T02D1277:127a-50: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am

T02D1277:127a-52: phat sv'a h'a / zhes pa 'dis tshim par byas nas /

T02D1277:127a-58: ta him ba la kha dzdza ai /
T02D1277:127a-59: ge dham ma aa n'a pi dzdza ai /

T02D1277:127a-61: dun du ra b'a dzdzi aa ai /

T02D1277:127a-63: k'a ppu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02D1277:127a-64: ma la aindha na sa linydza /

T02D1277:127a-67: shu ddh aa shu ddha na mu ni aa ai /

T02D1277:127a-69: ta him dza sa r'a ba pa ni aa ai /
T02D1277:127a-70: ma la aa dze kun du ru p'a ta ai /

T02D1277:127b-0: phyi nas bsang @127b gtor phul nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1277:127b-1: aom a'a: badzra pu sh'e h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1277:127b-2: zhes pa 'di nyid dang dh'u pa la sogs pas
T02D1277:127b-3: phul nas rang gis bye brag ma phyed pa dang

T02D1277:127b-5: du sngon bzhin yi ge brgya pa bklag sa nas

T02D1277:127b-16: dkyil 'khor dang / nas / slar yang shes rab

T02D1277:127b-19: zhal zas dbul ba la sogs pa sngon bzhin te /
