T02D1277:127b-25: aom dzva la badzra la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang
T02D1277:127b-26: so so la bod pa'i dam tshig byin nas rang
T02D1277:127b-27: rang gi sngags kyis zhal zas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1277:127b-28: aom a'a nee ra a'a tmya zhes pa la sogs pas bod par byas la /

T02D1277:127b-30: aa mu ka sya sh'intam raksh'a nytsa ku ru h'um sv'a h'a /

T02D1277:128a-14: na ma: samanta sam gh'a n'am /

T02D1277:128a-19: aom badzra au shn'i sha tsa kra brti /

T02D1277:128a-37: ces pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs
T02D1277:128a-38: pa'i sngags bcus shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang
T02D1277:128a-39: dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su yang g-yas skor
T02D1277:128a-40: gyis dang / steng dang 'og tu yang gshin rje'i
T02D1277:128a-41: rje bo la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po rnams
T02D1277:128a-42: gyis dang / la'o // aom ainda dza ma dza la /
T02D1277:128a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang po la
T02D1277:128a-44: sogs pa rnams la yang sngon bzhin sbyin par byas
T02D1277:128a-45: te / de rnams kyis kyang sngon bzhin bdud rtsi
T02D1277:128a-46: myangs pas mchog gi bde ba chen po thob par
T02D1277:128a-47: gyur nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa sgrub
T02D1277:128a-48: par byed pa'o zhes bsams te /
T02D1277:128a-49: smon lam la sogs pa byas nas sngon bzhin gshegs su gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D1277:128a-50: 'di yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gtor ma'i chog gnyis pa'o //
T02D1277:128a-51: bskyed pa'i rim par ni shes rab dang thabs rjes
T02D1277:128a-52: su g-yos pa'i khu bas zas tsam gyi ro myang
T02D1277:128a-53: bas / shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo rnams la dang /
T02D1277:128a-54: de bzhin du rang ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1277:128a-55: gyi dbang po la sogs pa'i lta dang phan pa
T02D1277:128a-56: dang bcas pa'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams la
T02D1277:128a-57: ye shes kyi ro dang dbyer med pa'i gtor mas
T02D1277:128a-58: nye bar mchod pa ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02D1277:128a-59: cho ga ji lta bar sbyang bar byas pa'i bgrang
T02D1277:128a-60: phreng tshad ldan rnams kyis sngags bzlas pas myur bar
T02D1277:128a-61: dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes pas /

T02D1277:128b-1: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir srad bu'i ming can te /
T02D1277:128b-3: yi ge rnams kyi srad ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1277:128b-4: grangs su byed pa'i phyir akasha su tra ste /
T02D1277:128b-6: ai las brjod pa ma yin pa'i zhes pas re pha dbye'o //
T02D1277:128b-7: de la mu tig dang shel dang /
T02D1277:128b-8: rus pa la sogs pa rnams la zlum po mdzes
T02D1277:128b-9: par byas pa'i ril bu rnams kyis zhi ba dang
T02D1277:128b-10: / dngul la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas pa dang /
T02D1277:128b-12: byu ru la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang dang /
T02D1277:128b-14: lung tang dang ma he'i rus pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi las dang /
T02D1277:128b-15: bu'i bon gyi las thams cad par kha sbyor thig ler gsungs shing brtag pa gnyis par ni /
T02D1277:128b-16: shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid //
T02D1277:128b-17: ni ram shus ni sdang ba la //
T02D1277:128b-18: rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid //
T02D1277:128b-19: bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa la //
T02D1277:128b-20: glang po'i rus pas char 'bab pa //
T02D1277:128b-22: ril bu brgya rnams kyis zhi ba dang /
T02D1277:128b-23: brgyad lhag pas rgyas pa dang /
T02D1277:128b-24: nyi shu rtsa lngas dbang du byas ba dang /
T02D1277:128b-25: drug cus mngon spyod la dang rgyas las thams cad la'o //
T02D1277:128b-26: 'jam dpal gyi rgyud du gsungs pa //
T02D1277:128b-27: brgya dang brgyad dam nyi shu lnga //
T02D1277:128b-28: lnga bcu de bzhin bar ma'o //
T02D1277:128b-29: de yi tshad kyi phreng rnams ni //
T02D1277:128b-30: kun phan sngags pas thag par brgyu //
T02D1277:128b-31: stong phrag brgyad kyang de bzhin bya //
T02D1277:128b-32: phreng ba rnams ni mthe bong tsam //
T02D1277:128b-33: de ltar phreng pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1277:128b-34: 'dir ni sngags pas brgyu bar bya //
T02D1277:128b-36: de la gzhon nu mas byas pa'i srad bu rnams
T02D1277:128b-37: padma'i phyag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
T02D1277:128b-38: rnam par dag pa phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su
T02D1277:128b-39: brgyad dang / dbus su kun nas rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D1277:128b-40: rgyas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par

T02D1277:128b-42: dgu'i yon tan gyi srad bu bsgril bar byas nas /
T02D1277:128b-43: rim pas ril bu thag pa la brgyus te /
T02D1277:128b-44: srad bu'i gdong gnyis mdud pa byas pa'i steng du ril bu ste /
T02D1277:128b-45: kun du bsten pa'i stobs dang /
T02D1277:128b-46: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang po'i chos kyi sku nyid do //
T02D1277:129a-0: de'i steng du ril bu gzhan ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin @129a * //
T02D1277:129a-2: de nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes
T02D1277:129a-3: su mthun pa'i kha dog gi ril bu tsan da
T02D1277:129a-4: na la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1277:129a-5: kye rdo rje la sogs pa'i sngags bzla bas ni

T02D1277:129a-16: thams cad ril bur bsgom par bya'o //

T02D1277:129a-33: mthe'u chung rnams su grung phreng gi phreng ba gzhag pa yang /

T02D1277:129a-35: lha dgug pa'i bsam pa dang bar byas nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /

T02D1277:129a-42: dam tshig 'ga' zhig brjod par bya ste /
T02D1277:129a-43: sems can rnams la snying brtse ba dor bar mi bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129a-44: gzhan la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa med par gleng bar mi bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129a-45: mngon spyod kyi las mi bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-0: 'jigs pa dang zhum pa dang khro ba la @129b so pa yongs su spang ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-1: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i don du
T02D1277:129b-2: bdag gi yon tan bsgrags par mi bya ba dang
T02D1277:129b-3: / phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sngags rnams rang gi rtog pa tsam gyis mi bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-4: bde bar bshegs pas gsungs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i sngags
T02D1277:129b-5: dang lha rnams kyang dbye ba med par gzung bar
T02D1277:129b-7: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1277:129b-8: la sogs pa rnams las slar chos dang cho ga
T02D1277:129b-11: bza' bya ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams rang
T02D1277:129b-12: bzhin gyis yongs su dag par mos par bya ba
T02D1277:129b-13: dang / 'jig rten la gnod pa rnams rjes su
T02D1277:129b-14: bsrung ba la 'jug par goms par bya ba dang
T02D1277:129b-15: dang / / bya ba ngan par spyod pa rnams drangs te /
T02D1277:129b-16: bdag gi nang gi nang du thob par bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-17: sgom pa po bdag rnal 'byor ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-18: rnal 'byor ma'i bdag nyid du the chom za ba
T02D1277:129b-19: de rnams kyi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i don spong ba
T02D1277:129b-20: dang / brda rnams la bdag goms par bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-21: ji ltar tshogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga de
T02D1277:129b-22: bzhin gshegs pa lnga dag pas bsten par bya ba
T02D1277:129b-23: dang / bud med rnams gdung bar mi bya zhing
T02D1277:129b-24: khyad par du phyag rgya'o gzungs ma la tshig ngan
T02D1277:129b-27: bza' ba rnams la 'gom par mi bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-28: chom rkun gyi grogs spang par bya ba dang /
T02D1277:129b-29: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga nag po'i tshes
T02D1277:129b-30: brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ril bur byas nas grib
T02D1277:129b-32: thod pa'i snod kha spyor du gzhag cing ji lta
T02D1277:129b-33: bar bdud rtsir byas nas nyi ma so sor bsten
T02D1277:129b-35: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang /
T02D1277:129b-36: sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad rnams 'bad pas spang bar bya ste /
T02D1277:129b-37: de rnams ni rab tu grags pa nyid yin pas ma bris so //
T02D1277:129b-38: de rnams dang gzhan yang dam tshig gi khyad par
T02D1277:129b-39: rmad du byung ba rnam pa mang po de dang
T02D1277:129b-40: de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud rnams su gsungs
T02D1277:129b-41: pa rnams grub pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu spros
T02D1277:129b-42: so // de ltar rtogs par byas nas 'gom par mi byas zhing /
T02D1277:129b-43: dam tshig smra bar yang mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1277:129b-44: brtag pa gnyis pa la sogs rgyud rnams su /
T02D1277:130a-1: thabs ni rnam pa du ma zhig / mthong nas rnam pa sna tshogs mngon rtogs dang /
T02D1277:130a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs rnams gzhan yang 'bad par byas /
T02D1277:130a-3: srog dang 'dra ba'i bla med bla ma dang //
T02D1277:130a-4: don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang //
T02D1277:130a-5: cung zad dag ni bskul bar gyur pa la //
T02D1277:130a-6: 'di ni bdag gis rab tu bkod pa yin //
T02D1277:130a-7: rang nyid gzugs brnyan 'dra yang bskul ba las //
T02D1277:130a-8: thub pa'i dgongs pa cung zad 'chad pa gang //
T02D1277:130a-9: de ni ngan pa'i spyod pa nyid yin te //
T02D1277:130a-10: ltung ba dang bcas dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1277:130a-11: mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le 'di byas la //
T02D1277:130a-12: bdag gis dge ba nye bar bsgrubs pa gang //
T02D1277:130a-13: de yis myur du dpal ldan kye rdo rje'i //
T02D1277:130a-14: rnal 'byor snod du bdag dang 'jig rten gyur //
T02D1277:130a-15: rnam par grags pa'i mkhas pa gnas brtan sh'akya srung ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i /
T02D1277:130a-16: dpal kye rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le 'di rdzogs so /
T02D1277:130a-18: // / lung rigs kyi dbang phyug skad gnyis smra pa'i gtsug gi nor bu //
T02D1277:130a-19: dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin las //
T02D1277:130a-20: brda spyod pa'i tshul la blo'i snang ba cung zad
T02D1277:130a-21: thob pa sh'akya'i btsun pa skyob pa dpal bzang po
T02D1277:130a-23: rgyud rgyal rin chen 'byung gnas bsrubs pa las /
T02D1277:130a-24: 'byung ba'i nor bu rim gnyis 'od dkar can //
T02D1277:130a-25: gang 'dis bod yul gdul bya'o ku mud tshal //
T02D1277:130a-26: rgyas par bya phyir skyob pa dpal bzang pos //
T02D1277:130a-27: bsgyur las byung ba'i dge ba rab dkar ba //
T02D1277:130a-28: de yis 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /
T02D1277:130a-29: pandi ta la ma gtugs pa dang /
T02D1277:130a-30: rgya dpe gnyis pa'ang ma rnyed pas nongs pa'i cha
T02D1277:130a-31: mchis pa rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzad
